title: Instructional Workshop for Designing and Assessing Mathematical Learning Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Course for acquiring design and evaluation methods of math problem-solving activities using VR simulations.

learning_goals: Design of mathematics learning activities by applying the six pedagogical dimensions (activity type, grouping, resources, interaction, time management, tools) of Conole’s learning object classification system.
Evaluation of the pedagogical validity of designed activities through inter-rater reliability verification (Cohen’s Kappa ≥ 0.6) among peer evaluators.
Development of formative assessment tools that measure learner engagement, conceptual understanding, and problem-solving skills in a VR simulation environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
